name: Smokey Deviled Eggs
description: Linnea Johansson gives this classic appetizer a smokey twist with Spanish paprika.
recipeIngredient: 6 hard boiled eggs, peeled and sliced in half
1/4 cup chopped chives, plus more for garnish
1 tablespoon smoked spanish paprika, plus more for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Remove yolks from eggs and place in a small bowl.
Add mayonnaise, chives, herb salt, paprika, and cayenne pepper to yolks. Whisk until combined.
Place egg whites on serving platter. Cut a hole in the corner of a Ziplock bag. Fill bag with yolk mixture. Pipe filling into egg white shells.
Garnish eggs with a sprinkle of paprika and chives.
